text: Love id blind, you can see in it with your heart
author: David

text: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
author: John Green

text: Loved you yesterday, love you still, always have, always will.
author: Elaine Davis

text: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
author: Angelita Lim

text: The real lover is a man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
author: Maya Angelou

text: I’ll be loving you, always with a love that’s true
author: Patsy Cline

text: Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive.
author: Unknown

text: I need you like a heart needs a beat
author: One Republic

text: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
author: Hermann Hesse

text: I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
author: Leo Christopher
